name: ARFaceGeometry
desc: A 3D mesh describing face topology for use in face-tracking AR sessions.

items.name: var vertices: [vector_float3]
items.desc: An array of vertex positions for each point in the face mesh.

items.name: var textureCoordinates: [vector_float2]
items.desc: An array of texture coordinate values for each point in the face mesh.

items.name: var triangleCount: Int
items.desc: The number of triangles described by the triangleIndices buffer.

items.name: var triangleIndices: [Int16]
items.desc: An array of indices describing the triangle mesh formed by the face geometry's vertex data.

items.name: init?(blendShapes: [ARFaceAnchor.BlendShapeLocation : NSNumber])
items.desc: Creates a face geometry matching the facial expression described in the specified dictionary.
